item.title: 911 For Peace
item.description: [[songs/m/madball/nyhc/for_my_enemies.md#ive-been-waiting-a-long-time-to-give-you-a-piece-of-my-mind-vyl-wnanory|It’s in the paper every day]] [[songs/m/madball/nyhc/for_my_enemies.md#ive-been-waiting-a-long-time-to-give-you-a-piece-of-my-mind-vyl-wnanory|I see it in the headlines and I feel so sick, yeah]] [[songs/m/madball/nyhc/for_my_enemies.md#ive-been-waiting-a-long-time-to-give-you-a-piece-of-my-mind-vyl-wnanory|As another life leaves this world (this world) so full of hate]] [[songs/m/madball/nyhc/for_my_enemies.
